nodes.text: Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith Scrapbook
Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith Movie Scrapbook is a young reader's guide to the events of Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith written by Ryder Windham.
The book makes reference to other Star Wars product lines, including the Star Wars: Clone Wars multimedia project and The Star Wars Holiday Special.
The book also includes the corvette as the Tantive IV, not the Sundered Heart.
